verbs.description: Both Pyongyang and Washington [V: are] pressing ahead on plans for a summit after Trump pulled out of the proposed June 12 meeting on Thursday , only to reconsider the decision the next day .

[ARG0: Both Pyongyang and Washington] are [V: pressing] [ARG2: ahead] [ARG1: on plans for a summit after Trump pulled out of the proposed June 12 meeting on Thursday , only to reconsider the decision the next day] .

Both Pyongyang and Washington are pressing ahead on plans for a summit after [ARG0: Trump] [V: pulled] out [ARG2: of the proposed June 12 meeting] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , only to reconsider the decision the next day .
Both Pyongyang and Washington are pressing ahead on plans for a summit after Trump pulled out of the [V: proposed] [ARG1: June 12 meeting] on Thursday , only to reconsider the decision the next day .

Both Pyongyang and Washington are pressing ahead on plans for a summit after Trump pulled out of the proposed June 12 meeting on Thursday , [ARGM-ADV: only] to [V: reconsider] [ARG1: the decision] [ARGM-TMP: the next day] .
